alert.note: Alert for Dickey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:51PM CDT until June 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL DICKEY COUNTY... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Forbes, or 9 miles west of Ellendale, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellendale, Fullerton, Forbes, Monango and Merricourt. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
